summary: A kidnapped young woman is forced on a road trip full of murder and mayhem that takes place entirely in her captor's getaway van.
cast: Maiara Walsh|Tony Todd|Danny Trejo|Austin Abke|Bryan Bockbrader|Adam Guthrie|Denise Dorado|Hope Diaz|Angela Robitaille|Joe Davis|Michael Mendoza|Luis Deveze|Dan Brunker|Katherine Joan Taylor|Lena Banks
title: VANish
